com.MASTAdView
Class MASTAdDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.MASTAdView.MASTAdDelegate

public class MASTAdDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

The delegate class defines interfaces developers can use to extend and/or interact with feature and functions of the SDK ad handling, including:

  • Ad download events and errors
  • MRAID ad events
  • Ad click events
  • Ad window attach/expand/close events
  • Third party ad events
  • User notification/approval events (for picture storage or calendar creation permission)

Nested Class Summary
static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdActivityEventHandler
          Interface which supports custom callback to be invoked when ad view is attached to or detached from an activity (window), and when a banner ad view "expands" in any way (MRAID expand, resize, or interstitial display), and closes back again.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdClickEventHandler
          The interface which will be invoked when loading a URL into the ad view.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdDownloadEventHandler
          The interface for ad download events.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.MraidEventHandler
          Interface for MRAID event handler, invoked when MRAID events such as resize, expand, close, etc.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.ThirdPartyEventHandler
          Interface for third party ad requests, with an onThirdPartyEvent() method invoked when third party ad requests are being handled.
static interface MASTAdDelegate.UserApprovalEventHandler
          Interface for handler to deal with user approval events before storing a picture or creating a calendar event.
